price: Њих ће тог дана Аллах да сачува страхоте и дароваће им блиставост и радост,
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhumu al-lahu sharra dhālika al-yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūran
translations: and will cause them to meet
